text: Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs () is an official whose primary responsibility is to serve as the spokesperson for Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs. == List == :Source: {|class="wikitable" |- !Tenure !Spokesperson !Minister !President |- ||Unknown – 1991 ||Morteza Sarmadi |rowspan=2|Ali-Akbar Velayati |rowspan=2|Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani |- |rowspan=2|1991 – 1998 |rowspan=2|Mahmoud Mohammadi |- |rowspan=2|Kamal Kharazi |rowspan=2|Mohammad Khatami |- |rowspan=2|1998 – 10 September 2006 |rowspan=2|Hamid-Reza Assefi |- |rowspan=4|Manouchehr Mottaki |rowspan=6|Mahmoud Ahmadinejad |- ||10 September 2006 – 21 July 2008 ||Mohammad-Ali Hosseini |- ||21 July 2008 – 12 October 2009 ||Hassan Ghashghavi |- |rowspan=2|12 October 2009 – 11 May 2013 |rowspan=2|Ramin Mehmanparast |- |rowspan=2|Ali-Akbar Salehi |- |rowspan=2|11 May 2013 – 30 August 2013 |rowspan=2|Abbas Araghchi |- |rowspan=5|Mohammad Javad Zarif |rowspan=5|Hassan Rouhani |- |1 September 2013 – 8 November 2015 ||Marzieh Afkham |- |8 November 2015 – 19 June 2016 ||Hossein Jaberi Ansari |- |19 June 2016 – 12 April 2019 ||Bahram Ghasemi |- |12 April 2019 – present ||Abbas Mousavi |} == See also == * Spokesperson of the Government of Iran == References == Category:Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs Spokesperson Category:Iranian Spokespersons Iran
title: Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Iran
